item.title: Lisk Blockchain Platform to Host Megaupload 2.0 and Steemit
item.description:
Lisk Blockchain Platform to Host Megaupload 2.0 and Steemit

Oliver Beddows, CTO of Lisk, has responded in the affirmative to a question on whether the Lisk blockchain is currently able to host a project of Steemit size considering the stability of its network.

item.title: Japan's Economic Woes Can Be Beneficial For Bitcoin
item.description:
Japan's Economic Woes Can Be Beneficial For Bitcoin

Nearly every economy in the world is struggling right now, thanks to the global financial crisis. Japan is one of the few countries in Asia where there is, in fact, economic growth. Then again, a 0.2% boost in GDP is not that spectacular either.

item.title: What's the process for the most powerful node to create a block in the blockchain?
item.description:
What's the process for the most powerful node to create a block in the blockchain?

This question involves 2 sub questions 1.What's the process for the most powerful node to create a block in the blockchain? 2.Because the tasks will always be given to the top n nodes in the list, how can the other nodes participate to create blocks?

item.title: KnC Miner Sold to 'Serious' Swedish Buyer
item.description:
KnC Miner Sold to 'Serious' Swedish Buyer

Bankrupt mining conglomerate KnC Group has announced that Gogreenlight has acquired the assets of its KnC Miner subsidiary. Also read: Suing Bitfinex Could Lose Traders More, Not Less The newly incorporated company, owned by Swedish entrepreneur Sten Oscarson, focuses primarily on green data centers. It purchased the assets for an undisclosed amount.

item.title: Nigel Farage Former Aide Allegedly Caught in FBI Dark Web Sting Operation
item.description:
Nigel Farage Former Aide Allegedly Caught in FBI Dark Web Sting Operation

Nigel Farage, the former Ukip leader's closest aide George Cottrell who runs Mr Farage's private office, is in custody in the US awaiting trial on 21 charges including attempted extortion, money laundering and fraud after allegedly being caught in an FBI sting accused of offering to launder money for drug traffickers after advertising his services on the dark web.

item.title: Bitcoin News for the week of 8/8/16
item.description:
Bitcoin News for the week of 8/8/16

Welcome to our weekly bitcoin news recap, where we cover top headlines and stories in the world of bitcoin each week. This week we saw news from The New York Times about how the World Economic Forum predicts that blockchain technology will eventually play a significant role in the global financial system.

item.title: Can you build an application on a separate blockchain from bitcoin? If so, what are the pros and cons of doing this?
item.description:
Can you build an application on a separate blockchain from bitcoin? If so, what are the pros and cons of doing this?

Answer (1 of 3): Option 1. You can use Bitcoin's blockchain software as it is and create your own permissionless blockchain. It will be a distributed system and a network with open membership. PROS: 1. Consistency. 2.Availability. 3. Tolerance to network partitions. 4. Tolerance to malicious atta...

item.title: Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - $11.20-40 Holds Key - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - $11.20-40 Holds Key - NEWSBTC

Ethereum price ETH faced a lot of heat over the weekend and moved down versus the USD. It looks poised for more declines in the near term. Ethereum price ETH faced a lot of heat over the weekend and moved down versus the USD. It looks poised for more declines in the near term.

item.title: The Crypto Show with Daniel Krawisz of Satoshi Nakamoto Institute and Justus Ranvier of StashCrypto
item.description:
The Crypto Show with Daniel Krawisz of Satoshi Nakamoto Institute and Justus Ranvier of StashCrypto

Tonight we talk with Scrooge McAltcoin aka Daniel Krawisz and Justus Ranvier. We cover a range of Topics including Gold and Daniels recent article at NakamotoInstitute.org Who Controls Ethereum. http://nakamotoinstitute.org/mempool/who-controls-ethereum/ As well as a brief discussion on whether or not Steemit is a scam.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Analysis - Selling pressure continues
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Analysis - Selling pressure continues

The technical setups posted below use simple trend detection, support and resistance, channels, pattern and candlestick analysis. We aim for high-probability trade setups on BTCUSD and use very few indicators. All charts use BNC's Bitcoin Liquid Index for maximum accuracy. The timeframe for trades is 1 to 7 days, so we'll use 4h candlesticks.
